text: Stephen Lovell is professor of modern history at King's College London. Lovell's research relates to Russian history since 1750, particularly the cultural and social history of 19th and 20th century Russia.Professor Stephen Lovell. King's College London. Retrieved 22 May 2015. Lovell studied at King's College, Cambridge and the School of Slavonic and East European Studies, which today forms part of University College London.Inaugural Lecture: Professor Stephen Lovell. King's College London.
